ygData.subject: Re: Ebay..I can't believe it
ygData.msgSnippet: Of course, if you play on Test, like me, even if you wanted to spend real money to get something, the opportunity would never provide itself. As a point of
ygData.messageBody:
Of course, if you play on Test, like me, even if you wanted to spend
real money to get something, the opportunity would never provide
itself.
As a point of reference, I went home at lunch and got on and there
were 130 people on. Of course, the test server went down 30 minutes
later....


>From: "Patrick Myers" <chrisstauf@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Ebay..I can't believe it
>Date: Thu, 29 Jul 1999 10:41:14 MST
>
>From: "Patrick Myers" <chrisstauf@...>
>
>Has anybody seen what you can buy for Everquest on Ebay...if you want a
>laugh go to www.ebay.com in the search box type everquest *** where *** is
>your server name..ex "everquest karana". See what comes up. I saw 5000PP
>going for over $100.00..I also saw a bloodforge hammer going for
>$30.00...that's real money..I see them sell for around 30pp in the game..Am
>I to understand a Platinum is equivalant to a dollar..I could only
>dream...just thought everybody would get a kick out of that. What are your
>thoughts on this practice? Anybody have any nightmare stories about getting
>ripped off?
>
>Chrisstauf Lightbringer
>Cleric of the 12th circle
>Karana server
>
>
